name: Germanwings Full Flight - Birmingham to Berlin Tegel (Airbus A319)
description:
Full length, uncut flight on 4U8331 from Birmingham to Berlin Tegel on Monday, July 21 2014, onboard Germanwings Airbus A319 D-ACNQ.  Includes the entire flight, from pushback in Birmingham to engine shutdown in Berlin.  Video taken from seat 11A.  

***PLEASE SUBSCRIBE, LIKE, COMMENT, AND FOLLOW ME ON FACEBOOK, TWITTER, GOOGLE+ AND INSTAGRAM!!***

*Every minute of the flight included from pushback to pulling on stand.*

Full Flight Video auf 4U8331 von Birmingham nach Berlin Tegel am Montag, 21. Juli 2014 an Bord von Germanwings Airbus A319 D-ACNQ. Umfasst die gesamte Flug, aus Pushback in Birmingham nach Abschalten des Motors in Berlin. Video vom Sitz 11A. * Jede Minute des Fluges von Pushback enthalten, um Ziehen am Ständer. *

Full route:  http://goo.gl/S5m3Cw
Flight Details:  http://goo.gl/Ygtda5

Please comment/subscribe!

***PLEASE SUBSCRIBE, LIKE, COMMENT, AND FOLLOW ME ON FACEBOOK, TWITTER, GOOGLE+ AND INSTAGRAM!!***

✈ ✈

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
